title: Deependra Singh Rathore is new CTO for payments at One 97 Communications
description: Manmeet Singh Dhody, who was the CTO of payments till now, moves into the role of AI Fellow.
content: One 97 Communications, the parent company of fintech firm Paytm, has appointed Deependra Singh Rathore as its chief technology officer (CTO) for payments.
cleaned_content: one <NINE_TEN> communications the parent company of fintech firm paytm has appointed deependra singh rathore as its chief technology officer cto for payments
